title: Name THREE champions that if you could, would delete. For any reason possible.
body:
For me

The champs would be

{{champion:119}} I have 100k mastery ( minimum ) on every adc except ezreal twitch kog and draven. I have 900k on Caitlyn, 300k on mf, 250k on ashe, 140k on sivir, No matter what the fuck i do, i cant stand fighting draven.  I hate getting 1-2 shotted by an adc, as an adc.


{{champion:67}}  Oh im 0-7? Too bad i can 3 shot you no matter what the fuck my score is. I have half your cs and you have 6 kills on me? Nope still stronger. 



{{champion:157}}  Who the fuck made this champ. For real. Its not even yasuo that bothers me. Its his fucking player base. Oh we need AP? better pick yasuo. Oh we need a tank with cc? Better pick yasuo top. Oh the enemy team is extremely punishing against melee champs? Better pick yasuo.
Oh enemy team has malphite zac and nautilus and we are all ad? Better pick yasuo. You know so those 3 thornmails make your adc feel right at fucking home.
Oh im negative? Better blame my jungler.

For real

#done ranting

Ftfy

{{champion:105}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:92}} 

Because they're all too safe and have way too many "get out of jail free" cards.

{{champion:67}}: Everyone has already explained why. I love winning lane against her and then getting penta'd by that same feeding Batgirl 10 minutes later.

{{champion:74}}: I really enjoy hugging my turret for 15 minutes straight and then getting tripled when my jungler and top laner try to help me out. To add insult to injury, all this little turd did was stand in one place all game and then pop Zhonya's when we tried to dive. And he has the nerve to flash his mastery for that show of "skill".

{{champion:63}}: He just stands there and lobs aoe "skill" shots at you all game, which are practically undodgeable unless you're playing a highly mobile champ like Katarina. He builds hp items and still can quadra kill with a single point-and-click ability. And he gets a free DFT passive, uses DFT masteries, and picks ignite for one of his summoner spells.
Here's the solution to the Batgirl problem. Get the {{champion:35}} (Joker) and give him a {{item:3145}} (revolver). If you've read The Killing Joke, you know what happens next.
Turn that bitch into a nightstand.

Yasuo and Vayne are on my list too but im going to skip them and go to 3-5 on the list so i don't get lazy and type same as above.

{{champion:23}}: Where do i even start with this champion? Who the hell thought it was a good idea to make a champions laning phase be based entirely around RNG? His kit is designed to just sit in lane and push. Nothing else at all. Atleast Nasus gets to come down once a game because he wants to smash the the enemy ADC with his 600 stacks. But with Tryndamere all you can do is sit in your lane. And somehow im always playing top when the enemy picks him so im stuck with the boring job of babysitting his ass, and he always gets picked after me so i can't even go Rammus top or something to make the lane funny for me. While the rest of my team is making plays and fighting, im in a permanent 1v1 against one of the least interesting champions in the game. Im just not sure how Tryndamere hasn't been put on the VGU list yet because he is a shining example of poor champion design.

{{champion:126}}: He looks like one of the biggest fuckbois on the planet. But you never get to bash his face in because his play style is "Im a poke mage, i get to chunk you for 1/3 of your health. Oh but you just dashed on top of me, now im a fighter who can just push you away. Look im a poke mage again." His Melee form covers almost all of the weaknesses his ranged form has and his ranged form bails him put of all matchups that should be annoying for the average melee fighter. Like what the hell Riot?

{{champion:76}}: Riot knows how to fix her, but refuse to do it. Ever since she was allowed to jungle for pretty much no reason shes been overbearing and one of the top junglers in the game for pros. This wouldn't be the end of the world if she was interesting to watch/play against, but shes not. Every time the camera shows the Nidalee in the first 10 minutes or so, its just her farming really fast so she can run into the enemy jungle and do the same thing. You get to see 1 gank, and when the stars align you might get to see her gank twice in a pro game, but mostly shes just farming really fast and I feel like it takes away from the game. Normally when i dont see an annoying champion for a while my hatred for them goes down a little bit, but Nidalee is special in the fact that every time i see her in my games or in a LCS game i feel even more bored than the last time i saw her. Riot keeps nerfing her but it never does anything because shes always still there still doing the same old shit. They know Nidalee is in the club of champions that can't be balanced for both pros and normal players, yet while {{champion:268}} {{champion:429}} and other members of the group sit there in the gutter, they keep on thinking that Nidalee isnt like that and cant be fixed when she just shouldn't be allowed to jungle. At the rate their going, Riot will end up killing off all the Nidalee mains and throw her on the VGU list (probably ahead of Tryndamere too) when they could just kick her out of the jungle and buff her up to let her play mid lane or top lane. And all of it's happening because Riot can't admit it was a mistake to let her do so in the 1st place

{{champion:157}}
Should be fairly self-explanatory.
Incredibly frustrating to deal with.  Infinite mobility so he's incredibly hard to hit with skillshots.  Windwall to negate your powerful spells, ultimates, or even basic attacks without you being able to do anything (the success or failure of wind wall is all on the Yasuo player's reactions).  An insanely strong shield that can often negate any damage that does get through his other two defences, and refreshes rather fast.
No cooldowns to speak of.  Manaless and AD, meaning that he can stay in lane almost indefinitely *and* is really good at pushing.
A third-Q which is a long-ranged, wide-skillshot knockup which he can hold for **ten whole seconds** and completely zone you during that time.
Seriously, the worst-designed champion in the game and it still boggles my mind that he was not only released, but still exists in that state after three years.

{{champion:64}}
Overloaded kit and way too forgiving.
Yes, he takes mechanical skill, but his kit allows him to make tons of mistakes and still either get out alive, or even kill his opponent.
He also has very little counterplay other than "hope the Lee Sin player is bad".
I never feel like I've been outplayed by a Lee Sin, rather when one beats me I feel like there was nothing I could do to avoid it because that Lee Sin player could hit his buttons fast enough that there was no counterplay.

{{champion:238}} 
Because his kit gives the false illusion of counterplay when it fact it has fairly little other than counterbuilding him with Zhonya's Hourglass.
When he ults you, can just spam all of his abilities and is guaranteed to hit them (because he's already inside you), and then blink back to safety.  It takes you a while to die because of the mark, but short of an Hourglass or some kind of barrier/shield spell, there's not actually anything you can do to prevent yourself from dying in most cases.  The delay gives the illusion that there's something that you can do, but often there isn't.  You're already dead, you just haven't caught up yet.
Add the fact that he's another manaless AD caster who can push easily with no cost, and is also quite low-risk because of the escapes in his kit.
Of the three, I think he's the one that could most easily be "fixed" and made into a healthy champion with a small-scale rework, rather than outright deleted.


Honourable mention:
{{champion:429}}
She would be on the list if she wasn't currently nerfed to the point that I never see her.
The infinite hopping which makes her hard-counter any champion with a shorter range than her and without a strong gapcloser/burst should not exist in the game - and it also looks ridiculous and breaks her theme, to boot.
{{champion:114}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:23}}

the real question is why isnt he yours

{{champion:143}}: If she could, she'd probably make a giant plant middle finger to any melee support.

{{champion:67}}: I may be 0/12, but I will still 1v5 you.

{{champion:157}} Because.
 {{champion:64}} He is overloaded......(notice I am not saying Op)
 {{champion:27}} To stop this stupid shit about the "support" singe...........
{{champion:161}} {{champion:420}} Take turns making that Hentai.

We already know the answers. 

Yasuo spams. These threads are fucking pointless.
Don't fully understand {{champion:119}}  pick. Do you not remember super bleed days? Now that, was something to fear.

{{champion:157}}: There should be no need to say anything on him. His design is cool, but extremely flawed (in his favor) and his optimizations are really unfair, they nerfed nida because she had too many optimizations in her kit (before anyone qq about me mentioning this: I hate nida and I think they were all deserved nerfs), and she had less than half of what Yasuo gets, he's also heavily based around the most toxic mechanic of the game (crit) and around covering his own weaknesses (every part of his kit covers the weakness of another part). I don't want to go too much into details so I'll leave it at this.

{{champion:143}}: SHE.IS.NOT.A.SUPPORT. she is a burst mage played support because her mid was gutted, which happened because people played her support too and she was too strong there... did I mention that she's balanced around being a control mage and that she can move her control zone instantly to whever she pleases?.

{{champion:67}}: She will come back no matter what, she will be stronger than you no matter what and she will flame no matter what. Seriously I love to have agood vayne as an adc, but that's because it will carry my game, I still hate the champ. And if we think that fixing her is perfectly possible but that riot simply doesn't do that it's even more infuriating.


I am biased obviously, I hate this champs, but this is my opinion.

{{champion:5}} Walking item mount who hasn't been balanced since his release.

{{champion:55}} Faceroll 2 Win

{{champion:238}} Most assassins have to 100-0 you. Zed with ult up? Only has to 100-50 you. Ergo, 50% less counterplay.

Kat isn't faceroll to win anymore lol
I know, but this much salt doesn't come off in one patch, bro.

{{champion:157}} Should never have been created in the first place. He failed at being the unique botlane ADC he was intended to be, and his kit proved to be an enormous pain in the ass as soon as you take it anywhere else. There's no way to fix him, and Riot has shown they have no interest in trying. He needs to go.

{{champion:39}} I just really don't like her. She's extremely bland, both as a kit and as a character. She's an absolute waste of the telekinetic blademaster idea. Nothing in her kit says "I wield my weapons with my mind" and nothing in her kit is really all that unique or interesting. The opportunity cost of her existence is too high to justify her boring kit. Delete and remake from scratch.

{{champion:67}} She got to be flavor of the month for 5 years straight. I think it's time she takes a break from existing for a few years.

{{champion:64}}  cancer

For the sole purpose of watching the Boards explode in unholy fury when they found out that Windman, Fizz, Stabby Tabby McKnifecat, Lebullshit, Bruce Vayne, and all of their other most hated champions got to live on.
I only want one gone. {{champion:7}}

{{champion:107}}  This guy gets reworked multiple times and and he's still a pain in the ass to play against from 1 shotting squishies in .5 seconds to being tank and just 1 shotting everything in his range. Between every rework he's either OP or pure garbage, i don't think there is a middle ground with this guy.

{{champion:74}} There is NOTHING fun about this goggled fuzzy turd. He's not fun to play as, he's not fun to play against. When ever i see him get picked on the enemy team, it's pretty much "Gee i guess i'm glued to this fucking lane which is getting permanently pushed in. My jungler can't do jack squat about it because a gank will most likely give that little shit a double kill. Fun? Never heard of it!"

{{champion:78}} Some how she can build pure tank and dish out a reasonable amount of damage while cc you and your team to high hell. Unlike {{champion:106}} who's damage is like on a 18 second cool down. It really boils down to the point of pretty much ignoring her in because she's running around with 300 armor, 4500 health, and about either 180-200 MR mid to late game. 

Honorable Mentions

{{champion:157}} 90% of the comments on this post have such a hate boner for him so it made no sense going in on how i loathe Yasuo and his fanbase.

{{champion:429}} If she wasn't poo poo tier right now she would have been the very first on this list. But still, who the hell thought Kalishit's Kit was healthy for this game

Riot Employee 1:"What if we made an adc who, multiple dashes with her AAs, has an infinite stacking mechanic so she has better secure on neutral monsters than her own junglers, give her %HP damage accompanied with a slow and turns her support into a projectile!"

Riot Employee 2: "Wouldn't that rupture the balance of this game?"

Riot Employee 1:"Ha, who needs balance when you got a blue ghost lady hopping around like a rabbit on crack cocaine making BIG LCS PLAYS! The fanbase will eat that shit up!"

Riot Employee 3:" That's a great idea, lets put it on PBE and see how the players react to it"

Riot Employee 2: "We got the feed back about our new abominat- i mean adc"

Riot Employee 1&3: "And?"

Riot Employee 2"They say that she's severely overloaded and would request that she gets looked at further than putting her on the live server in the next patch"

Riot Employee 3: "She's a success, put her on the live servers"

Riot Employee 2: "But!"

Riot Employee 3: *Deep demonic voice* "I said put her on the live servers!"

Riot Employee 2: "Yes, sir..."

Riot Employee 1:"Sir, i got another great idea for a champion!"

Riot Employee 3:"Do tell!"

Riot Employee 1: "What if we made a skirmishing assassin with high base damages and so much utility that he's gonna be played as a high damage tank instead of his intended role! {{champion:245}} "

Riot Riot Employee 3: "Brilliant, lets start working on it!"

*Riot Employee 2 screams and jumps out the window"

His Troll pole always ends up killing me and winning fights he normally should have lost

{{champion:67}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:64}} 

Favorite lovechilds of Riot, always getting preferential treatment in buffs and nerfs because they are big $$$ for Riot at professional level.

2 {{champion:105}} : Untargetability into Mobility on an Assassin.  
(3. Camille: Untargetability into Mobility on a wanna be Assassin.)


For real - I have no problem with Zhonyas or Pools - even Ekko is fine. But having mobility and untargetability on one spell which also deals DMG - that's the definition of 'overloaded' and most toxic thing existing in League from my point of view.
